name: Mini Phonograph
desc: A miniaturized phonograph that appears to have recorded certain sounds. It might perhaps come in handy...?

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Choppy, Broken Recording:</color>
...Stupid researchers... not even a ten-thousandth of your intelligence...
Cooperation... Mora... big business... doesn't work out, we'll just have to make him suffer some...
...Contract is here... sign here...
...Huh!? What's... happening...
(A few dull thuds can be heard from the phonograph, and afterward, no more speaking can be heard.)

<color=#ffffff>Choppy, Broken Recording:</color>
...This research... big money... a pleasant collaboration. Trust me!
The Club's original purpose... provide for free... Research belongs to everyone...
Work with me... provide to more people... Professional business channels...

<color=#ffffff>Choppy, Broken Recording:</color>
We can't convince everyone... lots of research results...
...As long as you cooperate... I guarantee. first... maximum dividends...
...Become the wealthiest researcher... Research whatever you want...
Prerequisite... get Garcia... original data...

value.name: Daydreams Beyond Space and Time
value.desc: Garcia and company are preparing to return to Petrichor...
